query.mssql: CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX {1} ON {0} ( [Employee] ASC, [DeviceId] ASC ) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
query.postgres: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS {1} ON {0} (employee, deviceid)
